title: UI Sound Pack Integral
description: 2000 UI audio files including scifi, retrogaming and magical sound effects.
longDescription:
SOUNDCLOUD DEMO PREVIEW

 

More than 2000 UI audio recordings and synthesized files. Contains 3 sound packs:

  1. UI Futuristic Sound Pack - 734 ITEMS
  2. UI Retrogaming Sound Pack - 641 ITEMS
  3. UI Fantasy Sound Pack - 625 ITEMS


UI Futuristic Sound Pack can be used for any UI buttons but can also be used for spaceship engines, laser blasts and so on.

UI Retrogaming Sound Pack can be used for any UI buttons but can also be used for oldschool spaceship engines, laser blasts, coins pickup, player jumps, 8 bit explosions, earthquake rumbles and so on.

UI Fantasy Sound Pack can be used for any UI buttons but can also be used for magic spells, elemental bursts and so on.


Perfect for video games, trailers and films. Ready for integration.

 

More than 2000 stereo sound effects divided in 66 folders :

  • UI_SFX_Fantasy
  • UI_SFX_BookTurnPage - 20 ITEMS

technicalDetails:
Features: 2000 mono, stereo and looping files.


Number of Audio Waves: 2000

Number of Audio Cues: 2000

Sample rate / bit rate: 48KHZ 24bits

Do Sound FX loop: One shot and loop

Minutes of audio provided: More than 60mn

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
